H0.text: In Greek mythology, who was the mother of Perseus visited by Zeus disguised as a shower of gold. Semele

H1.text: In Greek mythology, who was the mother of Perseus visited by Zeus disguised as a shower of gold. Europa

H2.text: In Greek mythology, who was the mother of Perseus visited by Zeus disguised as a shower of gold. Leto

H3.text: In Greek mythology, who was the mother of Perseus visited by Zeus disguised as a shower of gold. Danaë

A4.text: He was a demigod, being the son of Zeus and the mortal Danaë
